globalActorSelector.name: Shown Actors - Global
globalActorSelector.label: Open Actor List - Global
globalActorSelector.hint: Global fallback actor list if client list is empty

disabledModules.name: Disabled Modules
disabledModules.hint: Comma seperated list of .js file names or module directory names you don't want to load the scripts from. Sometimes you might have to refresh the stream page for the new settings to appear.

hpPath.name: HP Variable Path
hpPath.hint: The path to the hp variable without including Actor (if it's 'Actor.data.hp.value' for example it'll be 'data.hp.value')

maxHpPath.name: Max HP Path
maxHpPath.hint: The path to the max hp variable

customEditor.name: Custom Overlay Editor
customEditor.label: Open Editor
customEditor.hint: Opens an editor that allows you to create your own stream overlays.

enableCustom.name: Enable custom entries
enableCustom.hint: Enables or disables custom overlays being rendered on /stream

sendSettings.name: Send settings to other clients
sendSettings.label: Open sender
sendSettings.hint: Allows you to send streamutil client settings to specified users.

saveDialog.title: Save before closing?
saveDialog.content: Do you want to save before closing?
